af3cf7806e9443739becf68eefed1bb24f3ef1c0.summary: OSX export: Default to fat format, make it an enum
af3cf7806e9443739becf68eefed1bb24f3ef1c0.body:
Since we want to distribute only the fat binary in the official templates, this should
make it work out of the box. 32 bits and 64 bits options are still available for people
that want them, but will throw an error if the binaries are not in the template zip.

(cherry picked from commit 02aeac12d1e0638ad223190b2eb5c6845090b4ed)

02aeac12d1e0638ad223190b2eb5c6845090b4ed.summary: OSX export: Default to fat format, make it an enum
02aeac12d1e0638ad223190b2eb5c6845090b4ed.body:
Since we want to distribute only the fat binary in the official templates, this should
make it work out of the box. 32 bits and 64 bits options are still available for people
that want them, but will throw an error if the binaries are not in the template zip.

9420a1b6c11c39c3b8b41be37342fe89cde6e273.body:

register is kept when showing in the editor help and in the documentation.

the natural order in classes.xml.

7589307911063d904952d957c8c55ff94e56b96f.summary: Windows: prevent freeze while moving or resizing the game window.
7589307911063d904952d957c8c55ff94e56b96f.body:
When moving or resizing the window, Windows spins up a seperate event-loop, effectively blocking the normal one.
To work around this, we're starting a timer that will continue sending WM_TIMER messages which we can use to keep the mainloop running.

fixes #4695

(cherry picked from commit 6856c5249104d2b69fe297ff7546092e3bb23555)

6856c5249104d2b69fe297ff7546092e3bb23555.summary: Windows: prevent freeze while moving or resizing the game window.
6856c5249104d2b69fe297ff7546092e3bb23555.body:
When moving or resizing the window, Windows spins up a seperate event-loop, effectively blocking the normal one.
To work around this, we're starting a timer that will continue sending WM_TIMER messages which we can use to keep the mainloop running.

fixes #4695

a04a78c7f692e6ffea5a7934c27fa1f87b7b7b08.summary: correctly parse floats in scientific notation
a04a78c7f692e6ffea5a7934c27fa1f87b7b7b08.body:
GDScript incorrectly parsed float values in scientific notation
when no decimal point was given. "1e-5" was parsed as "15".

Fix this by not requiring a decimal point when we found an exponent
for the number to be considered a float.

Fixes #5267

(cherry picked from commit c246931f030fa434d9494835a565543ab7d61258)

c246931f030fa434d9494835a565543ab7d61258.summary: correctly parse floats in scientific notation
c246931f030fa434d9494835a565543ab7d61258.body:
GDScript incorrectly parsed float values in scientific notation
when no decimal point was given. "1e-5" was parsed as "15".

Fix this by not requiring a decimal point when we found an exponent
for the number to be considered a float.

Fixes #5267

66ce012ca621c8367105682249459af3251dbf49.summary: GLEW: Define static + enabled and includes via SCons
66ce012ca621c8367105682249459af3251dbf49.body:
This allows us not to have to hack our definitions in the upstream files,
making it easier to upgrade to newer versions in the future.

For the include paths to work, the headers are moved to a GL subfolder to
match their upstream location.

(cherry picked from commit 768e9252714b57421b5c893a8258469a14630a30)

This allows us not to have to hack our definitions in the upstream files,
making it easier to upgrade to newer versions in the future.

For the include paths to work, the headers are moved to a GL subfolder to
match their upstream location.

356c35954af46ed70790b6f9d75a13714e1144aa.body:
Can't create user data folder when project name has ``\ / : * ? " < > |`` characters on OS_Windows & OS_Unix.
So, change it to ``-`` to be able to make folder.

fixes #4928 and it's altanative to #4986.

(cherry picked from commit 9073dc99634285edc3b4886467871c14100f8233)

6d45fc07179d88fe8347eff9475273d3e9bbb0b6.body:
They were wrongly placed, creating a file named "-fpic" instead of
applying "-fpic" to the build. This file was in .gitignore, which made it
less noticiable.

This also adds build.gradle to .gitignore.

less noticiable.

24e5755e72c06d1d453f1c303d6dfc7c814ad8e2.summary: Fix MS Visual Studio build settings
24e5755e72c06d1d453f1c303d6dfc7c814ad8e2.body:
NMake was not setup by the vsproj=yes compilation
parameter. After attempting other possible options,
this is the best fix for our current requirements.
Compiling via NMake is implementing an alternative
to SCons, so this fix escapes out of NMake
environment while also supporting different target
builds and IDE error list integration.

Also sets -j setting to 2 so that it's easy for
people to change it to a propper value and speed it
up a bit for those that do not.

Adds two missing .gitignore Visual Studio temp files
present in Visual Studio's .gitignore.

(cherry picked from commit ca876191e548adee0c0ce4c3317eba818a6e0838)

ca876191e548adee0c0ce4c3317eba818a6e0838.summary: Fix MS Visual Studio build settings
ca876191e548adee0c0ce4c3317eba818a6e0838.body:
NMake was not setup by the vsproj=yes compilation
parameter. After attempting other possible options,
this is the best fix for our current requirements.
Compiling via NMake is implementing an alternative
to SCons, so this fix escapes out of NMake
environment while also supporting different target
builds and IDE error list integration.

Also sets -j setting to 2 so that it's easy for
people to change it to a propper value and speed it
up a bit for those that do not.

Adds two missing .gitignore Visual Studio temp files
present in Visual Studio's .gitignore.

9b03b9e989dd989f30b23f83b17bd0d1f125b8c0.summary: Change low processor usage mode to cap to 60 FPS rather than 40 FPS
9b03b9e989dd989f30b23f83b17bd0d1f125b8c0.body:
This results in smoother operation in the editor, without needing to
resort to the "Update Always" method which uses more resources than
needed.

(cherry picked from commit cc5a020afe3e02a421b3fcfdfac3b6ea9cf6699d)

3a1e69f45c46597f9d649fb864e37c3b62cb435a.summary: Travis: Install android *DKs in verbose mode
3a1e69f45c46597f9d649fb864e37c3b62cb435a.body:
Builds tend to fail due to the 10 min limit for stalled builds.
Most likely because the download is done silently and takes more than
10 min depending on the Travis connection.
(cherry picked from commit 83913e86fe5b5553c107ffde5a00d380755707bc)
(cherry picked from commit dfb9ba877ec1591ef4d6ad3c8df56eaa43dc1bad)
